channel.title: Reflection on Awaiting Bits
channel.description: Recent content in Reflection on Awaiting Bits

item.title: Extract Available Settings Using C#
item.description: I was working these days on my library Blazor.Diagrams and I needed to write some documentation to show all the available/possible options. I could've done it manually, but there was quiet a few settings and I didn't want to have to update the table every time new ones are added.
